channel.title: Undocumented on htr3n's
channel.description: Recent content in Undocumented on htr3n's

item.title: Hugo hidden treasures
item.description: I have been spending quite a fair amount of time working with Hugo, especially on building this blog. Since then Hugo keeps amazing me with a plethora of nice features, ranging from systematic content structures, well-organised theming, to powerful templating, several useful functions and shortcodes.
